propositions.text: The document title is '特工系列：暴君的间谍肥后'.
The document contains sections identified by numbers.
The content of the document consists of dialogue and separators.
Dialogue includes utterances marked with quotation marks.
Some dialogue contains speaker identifiers like '【暴君】', '【龙王】', and '【 tyrant】'.

concepts.name: 暴君
concepts.context: Appears in the document title and as a speaker identifier.

concepts.name: OCR 错误
concepts.context: Indicates recognition failures in the text.

concepts.name: tyrant
concepts.context: English word, likely referring to '暴君', appearing as a speaker identifier.

concepts.name: dialogue
concepts.context: The spoken content within the document sections.

concepts.name: section
concepts.context: The numbered divisions within the document (001, 002).

concepts.name: separator
concepts.context: Lines of '==========' used to divide content.

hierarchy.structure: The document is structured into a title, numbered sections, and within each section, dialogue separated by lines. Dialogue often contains speaker tags and indications of OCR errors.
